text: But Timotheus himself, falling in with the company of Dositheus and Sosipater, besought them with much Gr. jugglery.  crafty guile to let him go with his life, because he had in his power  the parents of many of them  and the brethren of some: Gr. and the result will be that these be disregarded. The Greek text here is perhaps corrupt.  otherwise, said he,  little regard will Or, have been shewn  be shewn to these.
